TopicTitle: Science data lost when vehicle returned from Ike

Articles.Content:
Morning everyone,

Don't know if this is a known issue, but i thought it might help anyways. Had an unmodded, normal-difficulty career game and somehow all my science data is lost in the journey to recover it from Ike to Kerbin. I transmitted (and recieved) a few EVA and crew reports via the MK 3 antenna. After mining-refueling and flying back home everything else got lost somehow though. Although i can still see the data (review the reports and transmit them) on the journey itself it dissapears once my vehicle touches down intact.

Maybe it helps with further patches.

Black Dog
Could you post your save file somewhere?
